response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It comes with a wealth of features that cater to various needs, making it an invaluable asset. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. However, I am willing to extend a special introductory offer to you. Would you consider purchasing this product for $95? This is a fantastic opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a discounted price. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 95}
